innerHtml: This raytraced graphics scene was created in OpenGL 2 using C++ for one of my University courses, COSC 363 (Computer Graphics), during Semester 1 of 2021. The project itself received an A+ (97.5%) grade for the course.
The raytraced scene showcases reflections, refractions, transparency, fog, texturing, lighting and shadows. Anti-aliasing is also used in the scene, with super-sampling and adaptive sampling.
